str:translations.str:about_feeds: This is a web feed, also known as an Atom feed. Subscribe by copying the URL from the address bar into your newsreader. Visit About Feeds to learn more and get started. It's free.

feed.title: ~/s0undt3ch - virtualenv

entry.title: IPython and virtualenv
entry.summary: Recently I started developing my python applications using virtualenv so that I don't clutter up the system's python installation with non-system python packages. Everything was good until I wanted to use IPython instead of python's shell... â€¦
